divs: Sighting DetailsSINGLE WHITE BRIGHT LIGHT FLYING OVER THE SFV (LOS ANGELES) LAST NIGHT AROUND 8:30 PM.?? THE OBJECT FLEW FROM WEST TO EAST SILENTLY. NO MATTER WHAT ANGLE IT WAS AT IT ALWAYS WAS A SOLID WHITE LIGHT. A LOCAL SMALL PLANE FLYING WAS ACTUALLY ABOVE IT,, SO WHATEVER IT WAS, IT'S ALTITUDE WAS LOW. THERE WERE NO STROBES OR COLORED LIGHTS THAT WOULD INDICATE AIRCRAFT.
